xwikidoc.content: ### Missing: admin.antivirus=Antivirus Antivirus.ConfigurationClass_enabled=Aktiviert ### Missing: Antivirus.ConfigurationClass_enabled_hint=If antivirus scanning is enabled, for any of the attachment uploading, page creation or scheduled full-wiki scan operations. ### Missing: Antivirus.ConfigurationClass_defaultEngineName=Default Antivirus ### Missing: Antivirus.ConfigurationClass_defaultEngineName_hint=The antivirus engine to use during scanning. Use the Extension Manager to search for other implementations that you can install and use. ### Missing: Antivirus.ConfigurationClass_alwaysSendReport=Always Send Report ### Missing: Antivirus.ConfigurationClass_alwaysSendReport_hint=If the report at the end of a Scheduled Scan should always be sent to the admins, even when no infection has been detected. ### Missing: Antivirus.ConfigurationClass_maxFileSize=Maximum File Size ### Missing: Antivirus.ConfigurationClass_maxFileSize_hint=The maximum file size for which a scan should be performed at upload time (the scheduled scans won't be affected by this setting). ### Missing: antivirus.extension.name=Antivirus Application ### Missing: antivirus.log.title=Antivirus Incidents Log ### Missing:
